attributes.action: Mental health Services need to be more available to children and teenagers
attributes.additional_details: Why should it take an innocent child self harming to open peoples eyes that “you now need help” i have recently become a mother and to think that my daughter in years to come with a mental health problem would be pushed to one side i think is disgraceful- these children are our future and we need to take care of them in any aspect of life, weather they just want to talk to someone for a few weeks or a little bit of therapy THIS COULD SAVE YOUR CHILDS LIFE .
attributes.background: This week alone i have spoken to at least 5 different parents expressing their concern that the schools their children attend are making the decision they do not need help for their mental well-being. If a child if asking for help we need to stop making them feel so unimportant
